alert.note: Alert for Forsyth; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 11:01AM EDT until July 09 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1101 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Hall, or near Walnut Cove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Summerfield, Stokesdale, Haw River State Park, Belews Creek and Belews Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
